title: 3 and Out - Mahomes/Kelce All-Bros; Rodgers/Packers Bottom Line; NIL Winners and Losers
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Mahomes/Kelce All-Bros; Rodgers/Packers Bottom Line; NIL Winners and Losers
description:
In this episode, John is back from a brief break and ready to go! He dives into the special off-field connection between Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce, the bottom line for Aaron Rodgers after his disgruntled offseason, and his thoughts on the NIL floodgates opening in college sports. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
